Hello,

I am Captain Hill Gregory of the US Marine Force on Monitoring and Peace -keeping mission in Baghdad-Iraq. On the 7th day of June 2006, we were alerted on the sudden presence of some Terrorists camping in a suburb not too far from Karbala here in Iraq. After Immediate intervention, we captured three (3) of the Terrorists, twenty-six (26) were killed leaving seven (7) injured.

In the process of torture they confessed being rebels for late Ayman al-Zawahiri and took us to acave in Karbala which served as their camp. Here we recovered several guns, bombs and other Ammunitions including some boxes among which two contains nuclear weapons, one filled with hard drugs(cocaine) and the other four to my amazement contain some US Dollars amounting to $30.2M after I and two of my junior intelligent officers counted them. I however instructed them to keep this in high secrecy.

I am in keen need of a ÒReliable and TrustworthyÓ person like you who would receive, secure and protect these boxes containing the US Dollars for me up on till my assignment elapses in here in Iraq. I assure and promise to give you 30% of this fund, however feel free to negotiate what you wish to have as your percentage in this business..

Please assure me of your keeping this topmost secret to protect my job with the US Monitoring and Peace-Keeping mission.

Contact me through my personal email

Sincere regards, 
Capt.Hill Gregory.

Semper Fi,

Lewis D. Noogie

Number one, how were you able to move this money from Iraq to Europ? Number two, I assume we are dealing with what is essentially stolen money. I really know very little about this deal but I'm concerned about so many people knowing about it. Would you please explain a bit more about how this money got to Europ and what the involvement of this lawyer is.

Thanks. 
Lewd

March 12, 2007

Captain Gregory,

I'm not sure exactly what you've done but I think we're about to get screwed on this deal.

I got in tuch with that Barrister and he tells me that just to get this money is going to cost us 
$33,500! Hill (if I may use your first name), there's no way it can cost that much. First of all, the money is not in Europ as you thought - he's moved it to freakin' Malaysia! Did you authorize him to do that?

Now he says we have to obtain a letter of Power of Attorney, from the High Court in Italy, a letter of Funds Transfer from the European Union, an Anti Terrorist Certificate from the European Union, to prove that the Funds are legal and not illegal, due to the Terrorist attack all over the Europe and America, an In Land Tax Revenue Certificate to Prove that the Funds are Tax Free and a letter of Incorporation, from the Commission Office in Italy. I've never heard of anything like this to move money and I've moved money all over the world in the course of my business.

Hill, I hate to be blunt but this money that we're trying to move is stolen. Like I said earlier, I don't have a problem with that. Paper money would not stand up to the heat where Sadam is. But this barrister is turning out to be a bigger thief than we are.

I need your input on how we ought to handle this.

Lewd

Barrister West,

I have discussed your proposal with me partner, Captain Gregory, and we are in agreement that you have made some serious mistakes that we should not be obliged to pay for.

While you could have just opened an account in Captain Gregory's name right there in Italy, you instead chose to send the money to Malaysia. Now you are asking us to pay an excorbitant amount for all kinds of documents that should not be necessary. In my line of work as an International Hotel Consultant, I have transferred large amounts of money all over the world and have never once had to pay for an anti-terrorist clearance, whatever the hell that is.

You have complicated this transaction to an extreme. While we want to pay you what is reasonable and fair for your assistance, $33,500 for what cannot be more than a couple hours effort on your part approaches vampirism. Please reconsider and present us with  a revised estimate.

Thank you, 
Lewis D. Noogie
